Name: collname
Description: collation name (unique per namespace and encoding)

Name: collnamespace
Description: the oid of the namespace that contains this collation

Name: collprovider
Description: provider of the collation: d = database default, c = libc, i = icu

Name: collencoding
Description: encoding in which the collation is applicable, or -1 if it works for any encoding

Name: colliculocale
Description: icu locale id for this collation object

Name: collicurules
Description: icu collation rules for this collation object

Name: collversion
Description: provider-specific version of the collation. this is recorded when the collation is created and then checked when it is used, to detect changes in the collation definition that could lead to data corruption.
